amendment.description: Amendment allows States to decide whether or not to display the Ten Commandments on or within publicly owned property.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 28 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to declare that the power to display the Ten Commandments on property own or administered by the States is among the powers reserved to the States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Aderholt amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 180 (Roll no. 221).
